main_chart_1: This chart represents the top 5 largest number of users per country. The country with most amount of users is India with almost 7000 students.
main_chart_2: This chart represents minutes watched on the platform per country. Students from the US have watched almost 500 thousand minutes in total.
main_chart_3: This chart represents the distribution of minutes watched on the platform by month from January to October in the year 2022. In August the amount of minutes watched was the highest with the total of almost 323 thousand minutes.
